name: koishi-plugin-nhentai-downloader
description: nhentai 漫画插件，提供搜索、下载并打包发送漫画作品的功能。重构中，可能无法使用

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm-image-processor && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-dir ../wasm-dist && node ../scripts/post-wasm-build.js
scripts.verify:wasm: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('wasm-dist/wasm_image_processor.js')) throw new Error('WASM build failed: wasm_image_processor.js not found'); if (!fs.existsSync('wasm-dist/wasm_image_processor_bg.wasm')) throw new Error('WASM build failed: wasm_image_processor_bg.wasm not found'); console.log('WASM files verified successfully');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run verify:wasm
